message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $100. It's a great deal, as it's worth much more to me. Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of your product, but I am only willing to pay up to $90. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer, but I'm still hoping for a bit more.  How about $95? I think it's a fair compromise, and we can both be happy with the deal.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I understand your position, but I am still only willing to pay $90. I hope we can find a way to meet in the middle.
Bob, I'm willing to come down a little bit more, but $92 is my final offer.  It's still a good deal for you, and it gets me closer to my target price.  Let's make this happen!
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I am still only willing to pay $88. I hope this brings us closer to an agreement.
